INSERT INTO menu (id, name, parent_id, level, url, menu.order, remarks) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{level}, #{url}, #{order}, #{remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, level = #{level}, url = #{url}, menu.order = #{order}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, parent_id, level, url, menu.order, remarks FROM menu ORDER BY (id + 0) ASC
